title: BayAreaCoins
author: BayAreaCoins
content: You can get more details about this discount code on the FreeBitcoins blog:  https://freebitcoins.com/blog/working-10-discount-free-shipping-code-white-horse-vapor/Tons of dirty Bitcoiners I know these days vape.  The more you save on your vaporizers, the more Bitcoin you can stack.This evening I spent 30 minutes looking for a discount coupon for White Horse Vapes (URL VapeWH.com) and I had zero luck finding a code that actually worked.But if you use the link, http://whitehorsevapor.refr.cc/Freebitcoins, you will be given $10 off your purchase plus free shipping!  Each user is given a unique code through the link above that will generate their very own working code each time.White Horse sells Elfbar's for $13.  My local vape store charges almost $30.  That alone is a huge savings, but $10 off and free shipping is kinda icing on the cake.Your checkout page will look like this: If you're going to be a dirty vapor... you may as well save someone money to stack sats!
